Class CashRegister

  • java.lang.Object
    • CashRegister

  • public class CashRegister
extends java.lang.Object
    A cash register totals up sales and computes change due.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CashRegister()
      Constructs a cash register with no money in it.
